医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
在计算生物学中使用可解释的机器学习方法的指南机器学习是计算生物学中的强大工具，可以分析广泛的生物医学数据，例如基因组序列和生物成像。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Guidelines-for-using-interpretable-machine-learning-methods-in-computational-biology-Machine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Guidelines-for-using-interpretable-machine-learning-methods-in-computational-biology-Machine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e2a1c5e-41ca-455c-8850-47081de122e2 Fri, 09 Aug 2024 20:51:00 -0400 Guidelines for using interpretable machine learning methods in computational biology
低脂纯素饮食在降低 AGE 和实现减肥方面优于地中海饮食根据责任医学医师委员会在《营养前沿》上发表的最新研究，与地中海饮食没有减少的情况相比，低脂纯素饮食可以将称为晚期糖基化终产物 (AGE) 的有害炎症饮食化合物减少 73% 。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Low-fat-vegan-diet-outperforms-Mediterranean-diet-in-reducing-AGEs-and-achiving-weight-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Low-fat-vegan-diet-outperforms-Mediterranean-diet-in-reducing-AGEs-and-achiving-weight-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82cf99c7-94e7-4f48-8575-600945205480 Fri, 09 Aug 2024 20:44:20 -0400 Low-fat vegan diet outperforms Mediterranean diet in reducing AGEs and achieving weight loss
骨髓瘤细胞中逆转录转座子衍生的 DNA 邮政编码的新见解2024 年 7 月 13 日，《Oncoscience》（第 11 卷）发表了一篇新社论，题为“揭开用于骨髓瘤细胞内化的逆转录转座子衍生 DNA 邮政编码”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/New-insights-into-retrotransposon-衍生-DNA-zip-codes-in-myeloma-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/New-insights-into-retrotransposon-衍生-DNA-zip-codes-in-myeloma-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc984753-82f9-4ffc-95ff-5bb1d1a8e230 Fri, 09 Aug 2024 20:40:35 -0400 New insights into retrotransposon-derived DNA zip codes in myeloma cells
新研究表明睾酮如何预防严重的 Covid-19一项新研究揭示了有关患者睾酮水平如何帮助保护他们免受严重 Covid-19 感染的重要信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/New-research-shows-how-testosterone-may-shield-against-severe-Covid-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/New-research-shows-how-testosterone-may-shield-against-severe-Covid-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7c3490c-6cba-4349-b0d7-c6a89396017a Fri, 09 Aug 2024 20:30:35 -0400 New research shows how testosterone may shield against severe Covid-19
由于工作场所的虐待，黑人员工会经历更严重的抑郁和睡眠不足根据布卢明顿印第安纳大学凯利商学院的研究，工作场所的虐待导致黑人员工的抑郁和睡眠不足率高于白人员工。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Black-employees-experience-greater-depression-and-sleep-loss-due-to-workplace-mistreatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Black-employees-experience-greater-depression-and-sleep-loss-due-to-workplace-mistreatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ebb3cb5-081f-48f5-a502-923062d46c94 Fri, 09 Aug 2024 20:25:27 -0400 Black employees experience greater depression and sleep loss due to workplace mistreatment
分析为佩罗尼氏病亚型的分类提供了新见解根据美国泌尿外科协会 (AUA) 官方期刊《泌尿学杂志》九月号的一份报告，对在专科诊所就诊的男性进行的分析为佩罗尼氏病 (PD) 亚型的分类提供了新的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Analysis-provides-new-insights-into-the-classification-of-Peyronies-disease-subtypes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Analysis-provides-new-insights-into-the-classification-of-Peyronies-disease-subtypes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6f07fac-8ca3-4cde-887d-0f2045e7898a Fri, 09 Aug 2024 20:21:25 -0400 Analysis provides new insights into the classification of Peyronie's disease subtypes
探索 EZH2 在癌症进展和治疗中的作用zeste 同系物增强子 2 (EZH2) 是 Polycomb 抑制复合物 2 (PRC2) 的催化亚基，它通过赖氨酸 27 (H3K27me3) 上的组蛋白 H3 甲基化在转录抑制中发挥至关重要的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/EZH2s-role-in-cancer-progression-and-therapy-explored.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/EZH2s-role-in-cancer-progression-and-therapy-explored.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e658767d-04f7-4217-9c99-2930e76fa77a Fri, 09 Aug 2024 20:12:58 -0400 EZH2's role in cancer progression and therapy explored
突破性研究确定了肠上皮在乳糜泻麸质反应中的作用患有乳糜泻的人必须在日常生活中避免摄入麸质，麸质是小麦、黑麦和大麦中的一种蛋白质，它会引发肠道疼痛症状，阻碍营养吸收，并增加其他严重长期问题的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Breakthrough-study-identizes-intestinal-epitheliums-role-in-celiac-disease-gluten-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Breakthrough-study-identizes-intestinal-epitheliums-role-in-celiac-disease-gluten-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87c87648-637d-48ad-9139-7c39827c3d69 Fri, 09 Aug 2024 20:09:30 -0400 Breakthrough study identifies intestinal epithelium's role in celiac disease gluten response
立法改革改善孕妇和产后妇女获得心理保健的机会一项新的研究发现，如今患有抑郁症和焦虑症的孕妇和产后女性接受心理治疗的机会稍好一些。当他们这样做时，他们支付的自己的钱就会减少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Legislative-changes-improve-mental-health-care-access-for-pregnant-and-postpartum-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Legislative-changes-improve-mental-health-care-access-for-pregnant-and-postpartum-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d96caaf-ca74-4dcf-a23c-9fa5f407ceb6 Fri, 09 Aug 2024 20:03:49 -0400 Legislative changes improve mental health care access for pregnant and postpartum women
研究表明西方古典音乐如何对大脑产生积极影响无论是巴赫、贝多芬还是莫扎特，人们普遍认为古典音乐可以影响一个人的情绪。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Study-shows-how-Western-classical-music-elicits-positive-effects-on-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Study-shows-how-Western-classical-music-elicits-positive-effects-on-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6dcffe25-6486-48ec-9818-7894181d6822 Fri, 09 Aug 2024 19:56:59 -0400 Study shows how Western classical music elicits positive effects on the brain
